sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.cn: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

sentences.en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

sentences.en: I want the manager'sjob when he calls it a day.
sentences.cn: 等到经理不干了之后，我想接替他的位子。

sentences.en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentences.cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentences.en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: Leonard was nine when his father died.
sentences.cn: 父亲去世时伦纳德九岁。

sentences.en: She acted in her firstfilm when she was 13 years old.
sentences.cn: 13岁时她出演了她的电影处女作。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: When are we leaving?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.en: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.cn: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.en: When Eleanor returned, I was still sitting glumly on the settee.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺回来的时候，我还闷闷不乐地坐在长沙发上。

sentences.en: When he was in the air force he flew Tornado jets.
sentences.cn: 他在空军服役时驾驶旋风式战斗机。

sentences.en: When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.
sentences.cn: 我叫他停下，可他不听。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: When she had attempted to cut his nails he resisted.
sentences.cn: 她试图给他剪指甲，他不让。

sentences.en: When the chairman of Campbell's retired, McGovern was named as his successor.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔公司的总裁退休后，麦戈文被选定为继任者。

sentences.en: When the family came here from Russia, they were penniless.
sentences.cn: 那家人从俄罗斯迁来这里的时候身无分文。

sentences.en: When will the work be finished?
sentences.cn: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
sentences.cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。
